generated.title: GeneratedEnergyPerArea
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'EnergyPerArea'

description*.en: Energy per unit area is a measure of the energy either impinging upon or generated from a given unit of area. This can be a measure of the "toughness" of a material, being the amount of energy that needs to be applied per unit area of a crack to cause it to fracture. This is a constant for a given material..
